00057 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00058 {
00059     DecimateModifierData *dmd = (DecimateModifierData*) md;
00060 
00061     dmd->percent = 1.0;
00062 }
00063 
00064 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00065 {
00066     DecimateModifierData *dmd = (DecimateModifierData*) md;
00067     DecimateModifierData *tdmd = (DecimateModifierData*) target;
00068 
00069     tdmd->percent = dmd->percent;
00070 }
00071 
00072 #ifdef WITH_MOD_DECIMATE
00073 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *UNUSED(ob),
00074                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00075                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00076                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00077 {
00078     DecimateModifierData *dmd = (DecimateModifierData*) md;
00079     DerivedMesh *dm = derivedData, *result = NULL;
00080     MVert *mvert;
00081     MFace *mface;
00082     LOD_Decimation_Info lod;
00083     int totvert, totface;
00084     int a, numTris;
00085 
00086     DM_ensure_tessface(dm); /* BMESH - UNTIL MODIFIER IS UPDATED FOR MPoly */
00087 
00088     mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00089     mface = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00090     totvert = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00091     totface = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00092 
00093     numTris = 0;
00094     for (a=0; a<totface; a++) {
00095         MFace *mf = &mface[a];
00096         numTris++;
00097         if (mf->v4) numTris++;
00098     }
00099 
00100     if (numTris<3) {
00101         modifier_setError(md, "%s", TIP_("Modifier requires more than 3 input faces (triangles)."));
00102         dm = CDDM_copy(dm);
00103         return dm;
00104     }
00105 
00106     lod.vertex_buffer= MEM_mallocN(3*sizeof(float)*totvert, "vertices");
00107     lod.vertex_normal_buffer= MEM_mallocN(3*sizeof(float)*totvert, "normals");
00108     lod.triangle_index_buffer= MEM_mallocN(3*sizeof(int)*numTris, "trias");
00109     lod.vertex_num= totvert;
00110     lod.face_num= numTris;
00111 
00112     for (a=0; a<totvert; a++) {
00113         MVert *mv = &mvert[a];
00114         float *vbCo = &lod.vertex_buffer[a*3];
00115         float *vbNo = &lod.vertex_normal_buffer[a*3];
00116 
00117         copy_v3_v3(vbCo, mv->co);
00118         normal_short_to_float_v3(vbNo, mv->no);
00119     }
00120 
00121     numTris = 0;
00122     for (a=0; a<totface; a++) {
00123         MFace *mf = &mface[a];
00124         int *tri = &lod.triangle_index_buffer[3*numTris++];
00125         tri[0]= mf->v1;
00126         tri[1]= mf->v2;
00127         tri[2]= mf->v3;
00128 
00129         if (mf->v4) {
00130             tri = &lod.triangle_index_buffer[3*numTris++];
00131             tri[0]= mf->v1;
00132             tri[1]= mf->v3;
00133             tri[2]= mf->v4;
00134         }
00135     }
00136 
00137     dmd->faceCount = 0;
00138     if (LOD_LoadMesh(&lod) ) {
00139         if ( LOD_PreprocessMesh(&lod) ) {
00140             /* we assume the decim_faces tells how much to reduce */
00141 
00142             while (lod.face_num > numTris*dmd->percent) {
00143                 if ( LOD_CollapseEdge(&lod)==0) break;
00144             }
00145 
00146             if (lod.vertex_num>2) {
00147                 result = CDDM_new(lod.vertex_num, 0, lod.face_num, 0, 0);
00148                 dmd->faceCount = lod.face_num;
00149             }
00150             else
00151                 result = CDDM_new(lod.vertex_num, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00152 
00153             mvert = CDDM_get_verts(result);
00154             for (a=0; a<lod.vertex_num; a++) {
00155                 MVert *mv = &mvert[a];
00156                 float *vbCo = &lod.vertex_buffer[a*3];
00157                 
00158                 copy_v3_v3(mv->co, vbCo);
00159             }
00160 
00161             if (lod.vertex_num>2) {
00162                 mface = CDDM_get_tessfaces(result);
00163                 for (a=0; a<lod.face_num; a++) {
00164                     MFace *mf = &mface[a];
00165                     int *tri = &lod.triangle_index_buffer[a*3];
00166                     mf->v1 = tri[0];
00167                     mf->v2 = tri[1];
00168                     mf->v3 = tri[2];
00169                     test_index_face(mf, NULL, 0, 3);
00170                 }
00171             }
00172 
00173             CDDM_calc_edges_tessface(result);
00174         }
00175         else
00176             modifier_setError(md, "%s", TIP_("Out of memory."));
00177 
00178         LOD_FreeDecimationData(&lod);
00179     }
00180     else
00181         modifier_setError(md, "%s", TIP_("Non-manifold mesh as input."));
00182 
00183     MEM_freeN(lod.vertex_buffer);
00184     MEM_freeN(lod.vertex_normal_buffer);
00185     MEM_freeN(lod.triangle_index_buffer);
00186 
00187     if (result) {
00188         CDDM_tessfaces_to_faces(result); /*builds ngon faces from tess (mface) faces*/
00189 
00190         return result;
00191     }
00192     else {
00193         return dm;
00194     }
00195 }
00196 #else // WITH_MOD_DECIMATE
00197 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *UNUSED(md), Object *UNUSED(ob),
00198                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00199                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00200                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00201 {
00202     return derivedData;
00203 }
00204 #endif // WITH_MOD_DECIMATE

00207     /* name */              "Decimate",
00208     /* structName */        "DecimateModifierData",
00209     /* structSize */        sizeof(DecimateModifierData),
00210     /* type */              eModifierTypeType_Nonconstructive,
00211     /* flags */             eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsMesh,
00212     /* copyData */          copyData,
00213     /* deformVerts */       NULL,
00214     /* deformMatrices */    NULL,
00215     /* deformVertsEM */     NULL,
00216     /* deformMatricesEM */  NULL,
00217     /* applyModifier */     applyModifier,
00218     /* applyModifierEM */   NULL,
00219     /* initData */          initData,
00220     /* requiredDataMask */  NULL,
00221     /* freeData */          NULL,
00222     /* isDisabled */        NULL,
00223     /* updateDepgraph */    NULL,
00224     /* dependsOnTime */     NULL,
00225     /* dependsOnNormals */  NULL,
00226     /* foreachObjectLink */ NULL,
00227     /* foreachIDLink */     NULL,
00228     /* foreachTexLink */    NULL,
00229 };
